```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

##Make some vectors!!!

```{r}
marmots <- c("blue", "green", 4, "yellow")


#check the class!! Do this often
class(marmots)

##another vector

pika <- c(12.4, 6.8, 2.9, 8.8, 5)

## check the class!!

class(pika)

# Scalar multiplier
scalar_pika <- 5.2 * pika
scalar_pika
```

```{r}

bananas <- c(1, 2, 3)

apples <- c(6, 7, 8)

#vector addition

bananas + apples

#vector subtraction

bananas - apples

#dot product

bananas %*% apples


```

###Matrices!!!

```{r}
my_values <- seq(from = 1, to = 10)

my_matrix <- matrix(data=my_values, byrow=TRUE, nrow=2, ncol=5)

my_matrix

5 * my_matrix

6 * my_matrix
```
